name: Platform Fighter
description:
Player with a friend! Jump, double jump, swing your sword, and don't fall off the castle! The higher your percentage, the further you fly. The first player to 3 KOs wins!

Player 1 Controls:

  • WASD to Move
  • Spacebar to Jump and Double Jump
  • J to Attack
  • F5 to restart

Player 2 Controls:

  • Arrow Keys to Move
  • Right Click to Jump and Double Jump
  • Left Click to Attack
  • F5 to restart

Created in 2 hours for Game-U LIVE. Watch the recording here!
